Message.Title: Voter turnout in some districts Obama won as high as 141%
Message.Msg: which means that Obama received 99% of 141% can't beat a "ground machine" that is capable of delivering #s like that But lets examine the #s... say a district really has 1000 registered voters... a real high turnout would be about 75%... IF you got 97% of that 75% you would get 728 votes when you get 99% of 141%... you end up with 140 votes... Or close to 2Xs the vote you actually received... The creativity of the Obama machine was ingenious
